feedback:
Good attempt at Pataka! You're on the right track. Here's what to focus on:

**What to adjust:**
• Let's try to tuck that thumb in just a bit more so it gently rests against the palm.
• Also, make sure all fingers are perfectly straight - give them a little stretch!

**You're doing well:**
• Your fingers are nicely aligned, which is a great start for this mudra.

Keep practicing - you're making progress!
